results.title: Mini for YouTube
results.overview: The Mini for YouTube application displays the website 'https://m.youtube.com/' in the native BlackBerry browser.

results.title: Mini for Facebook
results.overview: The Mini for Facebook application displays the website 'https://touch.facebook.com/' in the native BlackBerry browser.

results.title: Instagram
results.overview: The Mini for Instagram application displays the website 'https://instagram.com/' in the native BlackBerry browser.
